resources.string:
Request id : 0
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current latitude (id : 100) and longitude (id : 101).

Request id : 1
Fix a location point for Requests 2 and 3.

Request id : 2
Starts and returns a PebbleDictionary with the current distance (id : 102) and direction (id : 103) to the fixed point every 1 second.

Request id : 3
Stops the threads of Request 2.
Request id : 4\nReturns a PebbleDictionary with the current altitude (id : 200).

Request id : 5
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current weather status (id : 300) and description (id : 301).

Request id : 6
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current temperature (id : 302).

Request id : 7
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current pressure (id : 303).

Request id : 8
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current humidity (id : 304).

Request id : 9
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the current wind speed (id : 305) and direction (id : 306).

Request id : 10
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the sunrise time (id : 307).

Request id : 11
Returns a PebbleDictionary with the sunset time (id : 308).

Request id : 12\nReturns a PebbleDictionary with the next available Transport from your current location (departure id : 400, departure time id : 401), to Lausanne (arrival id : 402, arrival time id : 403) by default.\nYou can configure the arrival using the button bellow.
